Package fr.inrialpes.exmo.align.service

Interface Summary
AlignmentServiceProfile  
DBService  
Directory  
 

Class Summary
AlignmentService AlignmentService The basic alignment service able to run a store and answer queries...
AServProtocolManager This is the main class that control the behaviour of the Alignment Server It is as independent from the OWL API as possible.
CacheImpl This class caches the content of the alignment database.
DBServiceImpl  
HTMLAServProfile HTMLAServProfile: an HTML provile for the Alignment server It embeds an HTTP server.
OysterDirectory  
QueryMediator QueryMediator A query processor that mediates queries through an ontology alignment.
WSAlignment This is an AlignmentProcess which perform matching by connecting to an AlignmentServer and retrieving or computing an alignment.
WSAServProfile WSAServProfile: a SOAP and REST over HTTP provile for the Alignment server It uses the HTTP server of HTTPAServProfile Improvements to come: - provide WSDL from that channel as well - implement request_id management (fully missing here) - use XML/Xpath parsers [Make it namespace aware please] - clean up
 

Exception Summary
AServException Base class for all Alignment Service Exceptions.
